ygData.subject: Sell That Lung
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail Fellow Gnomes.... I had a thought..... perhaps those being supported by their Guild can check this out - aqua lung used.... all charges gone.... how much
ygData.messageBody:
Hail Fellow Gnomes....

I had a thought..... perhaps those being supported by their Guild can check
this out - aqua lung used.... all charges gone.... how much does a HIGH
charisma charchter get offered from a Merchant? Ineteresting to know whether
thats less than a Merchant offers for a charged one. It may not be very
much... but intersting to find out and as far as marketing goes a good sale
point 'you get x hundred plat back on selling to merchant....'

I am too poor to practise tinkering yet, and need another couple of levels to
get some benefit.... sigh, gave up the Guild I helped get started cos of some
flexibility on KStealing... so now I wander lonely as a Gnome,,,,,,
hehehe..... perhaps us independents should hire our tinkering skills out to
guilds.....?

Fley Key Gnome Mage of the Solusek Ro

ps I just got my Mage Robe and in the process a LOT of faerie guards died...
ZERO diamond dust and WHAT does the gem cutter do... okokok it cuts gems...
right, for what purpose? What is the benefit? Thanks my brothers and sisters
